title: Nanoscale optical tomography with cathodoluminescence spectroscopy
title_cn: 阴极荧光光谱的纳米级光学层析成像
abstract: Tomography has enabled the characterization of the Earth's interior, visualization of the inner workings of the human brain, and three-dimensional reconstruction of matter at the atomic scale. However, tomographic techniques that rely on optical excitation or detection are generally limited in their resolution by diffraction. Here, we introduce a tomographic technique—cathodoluminescence spectroscopic tomography—to probe optical properties in three dimensions with nanometre-scale spatial and spectral resolution. We first obtain two-dimensional cathodoluminescence maps of a three-dimensional nanostructure at various orientations. We then use the method of filtered back-projection to reconstruct the cathodoluminescence intensity at each wavelength. The resulting tomograms allow us to locate regions of efficient cathodoluminescence in three dimensions across visible and near-infrared wavelengths, with contributions from material luminescence and radiative decay of electromagnetic eigenmodes. The experimental signal can be further correlated with the radiative local density of optical states in particular regions of the reconstruction. We demonstrate how cathodoluminescence tomography can be used to achieve nanoscale three-dimensional visualization of light–matter interactions by reconstructing a three-dimensional metal–dielectric nanoresonator.
abstract_cn: 断层扫描可以表征地球内部，可视化人脑内部工作原理，并在原子尺度上对物质进行三维重构。但是，依赖于光学激发或检测的层析成像技术通常受衍射限制其分辨率。在这里，我们介绍了一种层析技术“阴极荧光光谱层析”，以纳米级空间和光谱分辨率探测三维光学特性。我们首先获得三维纳米结构在不同方向上的二维阴极发光图。然后，我们使用滤波后的反投影方法重建每个波长的阴极发光强度。产生的断层图使我们能够在可见光和近红外波长的三个维度上定位有效的阴极发光区域，这归因于材料发光和电磁本征模式的辐射衰减。实验信号可以进一步与重建的特定区域中的光学状态的辐射局部密度相关联。我们演示了如何通过重建三维金属介电纳米谐振器，利用阴极发光层析成像技术来实现光与物质相互作用的纳米级三维可视化。

title: Generation of photovoltage in graphene on a femtosecond timescale through efficient carrier heating
title_cn: 通过有效的载流子加热，在飞秒时间内在石墨烯中产生光电压
abstract: Graphene is a promising material for ultrafast and broadband photodetection. Earlier studies have addressed the general operation of graphene-based photothermoelectric devices and the switching speed, which is limited by the charge carrier cooling time, on the order of picoseconds. However, the generation of the photovoltage could occur at a much faster timescale, as it is associated with the carrier heating time. Here, we measure the photovoltage generation time and find it to be faster than 50 fs. As a proof-of-principle application of this ultrafast photodetector, we use graphene to directly measure, electrically, the pulse duration of a sub-50 fs laser pulse. The observation that carrier heating is ultrafast suggests that energy from absorbed photons can be efficiently transferred to carrier heat. To study this, we examine the spectral response and find a constant spectral responsivity of between 500 and 1,500 nm. This is consistent with efficient electron heating. These results are promising for ultrafast femtosecond and broadband photodetector applications.
abstract_cn: 石墨烯是用于超快和宽带光检测的有前途的材料。较早的研究已经解决了基于石墨烯的光热电器件的一般操作和开关速度，该速度受电荷载流子冷却时间的限制，约为皮秒。然而，光电压的产生可能在更快的时间尺度上发生，因为它与载流子加热时间有关。在这里，我们测量光电压的产生时间，发现它比50＆fsfs更快。作为此超快速光电探测器的原理验证应用，我们使用石墨烯直接电测量50微米以下fs激光脉冲的脉冲持续时间。载流子加热超快的观察表明，来自吸收的光子的能量可以有效地转移到载热子上。为了对此进行研究，我们检查了光谱响应，并发现了介于500和1,500＆＃8197; nm之间的恒定光谱响应度。这与有效的电子加热相一致。这些结果对于超快飞秒和宽带光电探测器的应用是有希望的。

title: A metal-free bifunctional electrocatalyst for oxygen reduction and oxygen evolution reactions
title_cn: 用于氧还原和氧释放反应的无金属双功能电催化剂
abstract: The oxygen reduction reaction (ORR) and oxygen evolution reaction (OER) are traditionally carried out with noble metals (such as Pt) and metal oxides (such as RuO2 and MnO2) as catalysts, respectively. However, these metal-based catalysts often suffer from multiple disadvantages, including high cost, low selectivity, poor stability and detrimental environmental effects. Here, we describe a mesoporous carbon foam co-doped with nitrogen and phosphorus that has a large surface area of ∼1,663 m2 g−1 and good electrocatalytic properties for both ORR and OER. This material was fabricated using a scalable, one-step process involving the pyrolysis of a polyaniline aerogel synthesized in the presence of phytic acid. We then tested the suitability of this N,P-doped carbon foam as an air electrode for primary and rechargeable Zn–air batteries. Primary batteries demonstrated an open-circuit potential of 1.48 V, a specific capacity of 735 mAh gZn−1 (corresponding to an energy density of 835 Wh kgZn−1), a peak power density of 55 mW cm−2, and stable operation for 240 h after mechanical recharging. Two-electrode rechargeable batteries could be cycled stably for 180 cycles at 2 mA cm−2. We also examine the activity of our carbon foam for both OER and ORR independently, in a three-electrode configuration, and discuss ways in which the Zn–air battery can be further improved. Finally, our density functional theory calculations reveal that the N,P co-doping and graphene edge effects are essential for the bifunctional electrocatalytic activity of our material.
abstract_cn: 传统上，氧还原反应（ORR）和氧释放反应（OER）是使用贵金属（如Pt）和金属氧化物（如RuO 2 和MnO 2）进行的）作为催化剂。然而，这些基于金属的催化剂通常具有多个缺点，包括高成本，低选择性，差的稳定性和不利的环境影响。在这里，我们描述了一种掺有氮和磷的中孔碳泡沫，其表面积大为＆＃8764; 1,663＆＃8197; m 2 ＆＃8197; g ＆＃ 8722; 1 对ORR和OER都具有良好的电催化性能。该材料是使用可缩放的一步法制造的，该过程涉及在植酸存在下合成的聚苯胺气凝胶的热解。然后，我们测试了这种N，P掺杂的碳泡沫作为一次和二次充电Zn-空气电池的空气电极的适用性。原电池的开路电势为1.48＆＃8197; V，比容量为735＆＃8197; mAh＆＃8197; g Zn ＆＃8722; 1 （对应的能量密度为835Wh＆＃8197; kg Zn ＆＃8722; 1 ），峰值功率密度为55＆＃8197; mW＆＃8197; cm ＆＃8722; 2 ，并在机械充电后稳定运行240＆＃8197; h。两电极可充电电池可在2＆＃8197; mA＆＃8197; cm ＆＃8722; 2 下稳定循环180次。我们还以三电极配置独立地检查了碳泡沫对于OER和ORR的活性，并讨论了可以进一步改善Zn空气电池的方法。最后，我们的密度泛函理论计算表明，N，P共掺杂和石墨烯边缘效应对于我们材料的双功能电催化活性至关重要。

title: Nanoscale form dictates mesoscale function in plasmonic DNA–nanoparticle superlattices
title_cn: 纳米形式决定了等离激元DNA-纳米粒子超晶格中的中尺度功能
abstract: The nanoscale manipulation of matter allows properties to be created in a material that would be difficult or even impossible to achieve in the bulk state. Progress towards such functional nanoscale architectures requires the development of methods to precisely locate nanoscale objects in three dimensions and for the formation of rigorous structure–function relationships across multiple size regimes (beginning from the nanoscale). Here, we use DNA as a programmable ligand to show that two- and three-dimensional mesoscale superlattice crystals with precisely engineered optical properties can be assembled from the bottom up. The superlattices can transition from exhibiting the properties of the constituent plasmonic nanoparticles to adopting the photonic properties defined by the mesoscale crystal (here a rhombic dodecahedron) by controlling the spacing between the gold nanoparticle building blocks. Furthermore, we develop a generally applicable theoretical framework that illustrates how crystal habit can be a design consideration for controlling far-field extinction and light confinement in plasmonic metamaterial superlattices.
abstract_cn: 物质的纳米级操作允许在难以或什至不可能在本体状态下实现的材料中创建属性。向此类功能纳米级体系结构的进展需要开发一种方法，以在三个维度上精确定位纳米级对象，并形成严格的结构，跨多个尺寸范围（从纳米级开始）建立功能关系。在这里，我们使用DNA作为可编程配体来显示具有精确设计的光学特性的二维和三维中尺度超晶格晶体可以自下而上组装。通过控制金纳米粒子构件之间的间距，超晶格可以从展现等离激元纳米粒子的特性转变为采用由中尺度晶体（此处为菱形十二面体）定义的光子特性。此外，我们建立了一个普遍适用的理论框架，阐明了晶体习性如何成为控制等离激元超材料超晶格中远场消光和光限制的设计考虑。

title: Water desalination using nanoporous single-layer graphene
title_cn: 使用纳米多孔单层石墨烯进行水脱盐
abstract: By creating nanoscale pores in a layer of graphene, it could be used as an effective separation membrane due to its chemical and mechanical stability, its flexibility and, most importantly, its one-atom thickness. Theoretical studies have indicated that the performance of such membranes should be superior to state-of-the-art polymer-based filtration membranes, and experimental studies have recently begun to explore their potential. Here, we show that single-layer porous graphene can be used as a desalination membrane. Nanometre-sized pores are created in a graphene monolayer using an oxygen plasma etching process, which allows the size of the pores to be tuned. The resulting membranes exhibit a salt rejection rate of nearly 100% and rapid water transport. In particular, water fluxes of up to 106 g m−2 s−1 at 40 °C were measured using pressure difference as a driving force, while water fluxes measured using osmotic pressure as a driving force did not exceed 70 g m−2 s−1 atm−1.
abstract_cn: 通过在石墨烯层上形成纳米级孔，由于其化学和机械稳定性，柔性以及最重要的是一个原子的厚度，它可以用作有效的分离膜。理论研究表明，此类膜的性能应优于基于聚合物的最新过滤膜，并且最近的实验研究已开始探索其潜力。在这里，我们表明，单层多孔石墨烯可用作脱盐膜。使用氧等离子体蚀刻工艺在石墨烯单层中创建了纳米级的孔，这允许调整孔的大小。所得的膜表现出接近100％的脱盐率和快速的水传输。特别是，水通量最高为10 <sup> 6 </ sup>＆＃8201; g＆＃8197; m <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>＆＃8197; s <sup>＆＃8722;使用压力差作为驱动力在40℃测量1 </ sup>，而使用渗透压作为驱动力测量的水通量不超过70＆＃8197; g＆amp; 8197; m <sup >＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>＆＃8197; s <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>＆＃8197; atm <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>。</ p>

title: Carbon nanotube-assisted optical activation of TGF-β signalling by near-infrared light
title_cn: 碳纳米管辅助的TGF-β信号通过近红外光激活
abstract: Receptor-mediated signal transduction modulates complex cellular behaviours such as cell growth, migration and differentiation. Although photoactivatable proteins have emerged as a powerful tool for controlling molecular interactions and signalling cascades at precise times and spaces using light, many of these light-sensitive proteins are activated by ultraviolent or visible light, which has limited tissue penetration. Here, we report a single-walled carbon nanotube (SWCNT)-assisted approach that enables near-infrared light-triggered activation of transforming growth factor β (TGF-β) signal transduction, an important signalling pathway in embryonic development and cancer progression. The protein complex of TGF-β and its latency-associated peptide is conjugated onto SWCNTs, where TGF-β is inactive. Upon near-infrared irradiation, TGF-β is released through the photothermal effect of SWCNTs and becomes active. The released TGF-β activates downstream signal transduction in live cells and modulates cellular behaviours. Furthermore, preliminary studies show that the method can be used to mediate TGF-β signalling in living mice.
abstract_cn: 受体介导的信号转导调节复杂的细胞行为，例如细胞生长，迁移和分化。尽管可光激活的蛋白质已成为控制分子相互作用并使用光在精确的时间和空间发出信号的级联的强大工具，但许多此类光敏蛋白质却被紫外线或可见光激活，从而限制了组织的渗透。在这里，我们报告了一种单壁碳纳米管（SWCNT）辅助方法，该方法可以实现近红外光触发的转化生长因子激活。 （TGF-＆＃946;）信号转导，是胚胎发育和癌症进展中的重要信号通路。 TGF-＆＃946;的蛋白质复合物；然后将其与潜伏期相关的肽缀合到SWCNTs上，其中TGF-＆＃946;不活跃。在近红外辐射下，TGF-β。通过SWCNT的光热效应释放出来并变得活跃。发行的TGF-＆＃946;激活活细胞中的下游信号转导并调节细胞行为。此外，初步研究表明该方法可用于介导TGF-β。活小鼠中的信号转导。

title: Mapping protein binding sites on the biomolecular corona of nanoparticles
title_cn: 纳米粒子生物分子电晕上的蛋白质结合位点图
abstract: Nanoparticles in a biological milieu are known to form a sufficiently long-lived and well-organized ‘corona’ of biomolecules to confer a biological identity to the particle. Because this nanoparticle–biomolecule complex interacts with cells and biological barriers, potentially engaging with different biological pathways, it is important to clarify the presentation of functional biomolecular motifs at its interface. Here, we demonstrate that by using antibody-labelled gold nanoparticles, differential centrifugal sedimentation and various imaging techniques it is possible to identify the spatial location of proteins, their functional motifs and their binding sites. We show that for transferrin-coated polystyrene nanoparticles only a minority of adsorbed proteins exhibit functional motifs and the spatial organization appears random, which is consistent, overall, with a stochastic and irreversible adsorption process. Our methods are applicable to a wide array of nanoparticles and can offer a microscopic molecular description of the biological identity of nanoparticles.
abstract_cn: 众所周知，生物环境中的纳米颗粒会形成足够长的寿命且组织良好的电晕。的生物分子赋予颗粒以生物学特性。因为此纳米粒子生物分子复合物与细胞和生物屏障相互作用，并可能与不同的生物途径相互作用，所以弄清其界面上功能性生物分子基序的呈现非常重要。在这里，我们证明了通过使用抗体标记的金纳米颗粒，差异离心沉降和各种成像技术，可以识别蛋白质的空间位置，它们的功能基序和它们的结合位点。我们表明，对于运铁蛋白涂层的聚苯乙烯纳米颗粒，只有少数吸附的蛋白质表现出功能性图案，并且空间组织似乎是随机的，这在总体上是一致的，具有随机和不可逆的吸附过程。我们的方法适用于各种各样的纳米粒子，并且可以提供纳米粒子生物学特性的微观分子描述。</ p>
